Welcome to Konkan Group

Konkan Tools Pvt Limited is a versatile job shop that provides product and services as per individual client requirements in the field of manufacturing and medicine. We integrate easily with your manufacturing floor at any level of production and can handle your overload or any one time situation with continous commitment to cost saving.
